memories.name: Content Strategy Focus
memories.episode_body: Enjoy writing technical content that explains complex topics simply. Want to improve SEO skills and analytics interpretation. Collaborate with engineering team for technical accuracy.

memories.name: Sarah Miller - Content Marketing Specialist
memories.episode_body: Sarah Miller is Content Marketing Specialist on Marketing Team at TechFlow Solutions, reporting to Rachel Green. Specializes in content strategy, technical writing, and SEO optimization. 3 years content marketing experience.

memories.name: Content Calendar Q1 2026
memories.episode_body: Publishing schedule: 2 blog posts per week (technical tutorials, product updates), monthly newsletter, case studies quarterly. Topics for January: payment security best practices, API integration guide, checkout optimization insights. Working with Bob and Alice for technical accuracy.

memories.name: SEO Strategy
memories.episode_body: Target keywords: payment processing, API integration, e-commerce platform, secure checkout. Creating pillar content pages with supporting cluster content. Building backlinks through guest posts and partnerships. Monitoring rankings and organic traffic in Google Analytics and Search Console.
